item.description:
Hi All,

This is a lovely race through the center of Boston and partly along the route we all run on Dave's Saturday breakfast runs.

Sign up here - http://www.bostonsrun... and be sure to add "Yes" on here.

Nearer the time we can work out a place to meet before/after.

Any questions then please let me know...

Take care... Martin

p.s. you're responsible for registration, safety etc. etc.
item.how_to_find_us: TBD.. we'll work it out nearer the time

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Boston half marathon (Run to Remember)
